responses:
To pursue most degree programs, you typically need a minimum of three S passes in your A/L examinations. If you don't meet this requirement, some universities offer certificate or foundation programs that you can complete before enrolling in a degree program. Since you have completed your A/Ls, you are eligible to pursue degrees in various IT fields.
 If you have specific job or career interests, please let me know so I can provide further guidance

patterns: Pursue a degree in software engineering
responses:
These are universities, along with their respective entry qualifications, based on your interest in degree programs 
 NSBM Green University - 3 passes for Advanced Level in a single attempt for core subjects (Local or International equivalent) (London AS Level exams are not recognized as entry criteria).Completion of NSBM foundation programme. Completion of Edexcel or BTEC Certified foundation programme (*Subject to the approval of program director).Completion of any other foreign university affiliated foundation programme (*Subject to the approval of program director) And.Students should have passed Ordinary Level examination or equivalent including Mathematics and English  
 SLIIT - Minimum 3 S passes in G.C.E A/L (Sri Lanka) or a minimum 3 D passes in G.C.E A/L Cambridge or Edexcel (in any subject stream) in one and the same sitting, and pass the Aptitude Test conducted by SLIIT. To progress from the second year to the third year of the specialization, a student must meet the minimum GPA requirement specified by the faculty. 
 ACBT Campus - A Levels  -  A score of 5 Calculated from a minimum of 2 and a maximum of 3 A Level subjects. Local A/L calculate points: A=5, B=4, C=3, S=1  UK A/L calculate points  A=5, B=4, C=3, D=2, E=1  
 CINEC Metro Campus - G.C.E. A/L Any Stream 1C and 2S passes (Local) or 1C, 2D (London) + 5 Credit Passes for O/L (London /Local) including Credits for Mathematics Science and English or Foundation + 5 Credit Passes for O/L (London /Local) including Credits for Mathematics Science and English  
 APIIT Sri Lanka - Sri Lankan: 3 passes or London, Cambridge or Edexcel : 3 D passes or Asia Pacific Institute of Information Technology Degree Foundation  
         SLTC University - (i) Three (3) Simple passes (“S”) in Physical Science stream or Engineering Technology stream in one and the same sitting at the GCE A/L (Advanced Level) .Examination conducted by the Department of Examinations of Sri Lanka or equivalent qualification Or (ii) Three (3) Simple passes (“S”) in any stream in one and the same sitting at the GCE A/L (Advanced Level) Examination conducted by the Department of Examinations of Sri Lanka or equivalent qualification and a Credit Pass (C) in Mathematics at the GCE O/L (Ordinary Level) Examination conducted by the Department of Examinations of Sri Lanka or equivalent qualification with the SLTC bridging program 
 ICBT University -  G.C.E. A/L 03 Passes Can apply with pending results.
 ESOFT - Credit pass for English in GCE O/L OR GCE A/L OR Equivalent or Pearson BTEC HND in Computing / IT / IS OR BCS Diploma OR NCC IAD 
 Informatics Institute of Technology (IIT) University

To progress from the second year to the third year of the specialization, a student must meet the minimum GPA requirement specified by the faculty.

         SLTC University - (i) Three (3) Simple passes (“S”) in Physical Science stream or Engineering Technology stream in one and the same sitting at the GCE A/L (Advanced Level) .Examination conducted by the Department of Examinations of Sri Lanka or equivalent qualification Or (ii) Three (3) Simple passes (“S”) in any stream in one and the same sitting at the GCE A/L (Advanced Level) Examination conducted by the Department of Examinations of Sri Lanka or equivalent qualification and a Credit Pass (C) in Mathematics at the GCE O/L (Ordinary Level) Examination conducted by the Department of Examinations of Sri Lanka or equivalent qualification with the SLTC bridging program

patterns: Pursue a degree in data science
responses:
These are universities, along with their respective entry qualifications, based on your interest in degree programs 
 NSBM Green University - G.C.E. Advanced Level examination conducted by the Department of Examinations, Sri Lanka. or G.C.E Advanced Level examination conducted by Pearson Edexcel, UK (London A/L). or International Advanced Level examination conducted by Pearson Edexel, UK. or G.S.E Advanced Level examination conducted by Cambridge International Examination, UK 
         SLIIT - Minimum 3 “S” passes in G.C.E A/L (Sri Lanka) or a minimum 3” D” passes in G.C.E A/L Cambridge or Edexcel (in any subject stream) in one and the same sitting, and pass the Aptitude Test conducted by SLIIT. To progress from the second year to the third year of the specialization, a student must meet the minimum GPA requirement specified by the faculty. 
 ICBT University - HD/HND in Software Engineering + Computing or Any Other Equivalent Qualification (Case By Case Approval) 
 SLTC University - (i) Three (3) Simple passes (“S”) in Physical Science stream or Engineering Technology stream in one and the same sitting at the GCE A/L (Advanced Level) .Examination conducted by the Department of Examinations of Sri Lanka or equivalent qualification Or (ii) Three (3) Simple passes (“S”) in any stream in one and the same sitting at the GCE A/L (Advanced Level) Examination conducted by the Department of Examinations of Sri Lanka or equivalent qualification and a Credit Pass (“C”) in Mathematics at the GCE O/L (Ordinary Level) Examination conducted by the Department of Examinations of Sri Lanka or equivalent qualification with the SLTC bridging program 
  ESOFT - GCSE or O-Level in English and Mathematics at grade C or above or 240 credits with at least a Merit from a Higher National Diploma (HND), at least 2:2 (or equivalent) from a Foundation Degree (FdA/ FdSc) or equivalent international qualification in a relevant subject or 240 credits at least 2:2 (or equivalent) from years 1 and 2 of an undergraduate degree (BA/BSc) in a relevant subject at a different institution 
 Informatics Institute of Technology (IIT) University 
 NIBM University

intents.tag: Bachelor of Information Technology (Major in Cyber Security)
patterns: Bachelor of Information Technology (Major in Cyber Security)
responses:
These are universities, along with their respective entry qualifications, based on your interest in degree programs 
 NSBM Green University - Sri Lankan A Levels: 3 unit passes in the first attempt. Sri Lankan A Levels: 2 unit passes + Completion of NSBM Certificate Programme  or Sri Lankan O Levels: 6 unit passes (with 3 units at credit level) + Completion of NSBM Foundation Programme or Completion of Edexcel or BTEC Level 3 Certified International Foundation Programme (* subject to approval of VU Course Chair) orCompletion of any other foreign university-affiliated Foundation Programme (* subject to approval of VU Course Chair)
